original: 東吳將領。與武衛士施朔察覺權臣孫綝調兵在外，又動用武庫軍械，恐有謀反之意，兩人先後密告孫休，令孫休得以誅除孫綝。
text: Soochow generals. With the military guard Shi Shuo, he noticed that the power minister Sun Wei was out, and they used the arsenal ordnance, fearing rebellious intentions. The two informed Sun Xiu, so that Sun Xiu was able to punish Sun Xiu.
